text: وقال نوح رب لا تذر على الارض من الكفرين ديارا

translations.translation: Nuh said, 'My Lord! do not leave a single one of the kafirun on earth!
Noah said: "O Lord, do not leave a single habitation of unbelievers on the earth.
Noah said: “My Lord, do not leave out of these unbelievers even a single dweller on earth,
Noah said, "Lord, do not leave a single disbeliever on earth;
And prayed Nooh, “O my Lord! Do not leave any of the disbelievers dwelling in the land.”
And Nuh said: "My Lord! Leave not one of the disbelievers on the earth Dayyar!"
And Nuh said: My Lord! leave not upon the land any dweller from among the unbelievers:
And Noah said, 'My Lord, leave not upon the earth of the unbelievers even one.
And Noah said: My Lord! Leave not one of the disbelievers in the land.
Noah prayed, "O my Lord! Do not leave on earth a single one of those who deny the truth --
And Nuh said: my Lord! leave not upon the earth of the infidels one inhabitant.
And Noah said, ‘My Lord! ‘Do not leave on the earth any inhabitant from among the faithless.
And Noah, said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers, a single one on earth!
And Nuh (Noah) said: "My Lord! Leave not one of the disbelievers on the earth!
And Noah (supplicated) saying: 'My Lord, do not leave a single unbeliever upon the earth.
Noah said, “My Lord, do not leave of the unbelievers a single dweller on earth.
And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.
[71:26] And Noah said, ‘My Lord, do not leave from among the disbelievers a single dweller upon the earth (dayyār means ‘one who inhabits a dwelling [dār]’), in other words, not one.
(And Noah said) after Allah told him that none of his people will believe in him, apart from those who had already believed: (My Lord!) my Lord! (Leave not one of the disbelievers in the land.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { رَّبِّ لاَ تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّاراً } معناه لا تَتركْ منهم أحداً

translations.translation: And His saying, { "O my Lord, do not leave anyone of the disbelievers on the earth." } Its meaning is that He will not leave any of them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما آيس عن إيمان قومه، وقنط عن فلاحهم وصلاحهم أخذ في الدعاء عليهم، حيث { قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ } يا من ربَّاني على فطرة الهداية والرشاد { لاَ تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلأَرْضِ } التي إنما وضعت؛ للعبادة والطاعة { مِنَ ٱلْكَافِرِينَ } المصرين على الكفر والعناد والإلحاد عن السداد { دَيَّاراً } [نوح: 26] أحداً يدور عليها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { وقال نوحٌ رَبِّ لا تَذّرْ على الأرض من الكافرين ديَّاراً } أي: أحداً يدور في الأرض، وهو " فَيْعَالٌ " من الدّورِ، وهو من الأسماء المستعلمة في النفي العام، يقالك ما بالديار ديَّار وديّور، كقيّام وقيوم، أي: أحد، وأصله: دّيْوار، ففعل به ما فعل بسَيِّد
